item.title: Need help with my dialogue!(will rep, rep++)
item.dc:creator: @Project_Evolution Project Evolution
item.description:
@Project_Evolution wrote:

2nd thing;

sendFrame126("Select an option", 2460); sendFrame126("Yes, i will help.", 2461); addItem(995, 1); sendMessage(" Thank you, take these with you!"); sendFrame126("No way, I'm to scared!", 2462); sendFrame164(2459);

Ok as you can see I changed up the code.
You can also just change the sendMessage, obviously… :rolleyes:

995 = Item ID
1 = Amount

item.title: Need help with my dialogue!(will rep, rep++)
item.dc:creator: @1_vitiello_1 1 vitiello 1
item.description:
@1_vitiello_1 wrote:

kk guys, need help with 3 things

Heres my code first of all

case 14606: //Guardian sendFrame126("Guardian", 4902); sendFrame126(playerName+", i'm glad your here.", 4903); sendFrame126("You must stop the gods!", 4904); sendFrame126("They will destroy the world if you don't!", 4905); sendFrame126("", 4906); sendFrame75(2244, 4893); sendFrame164(4900); NpcDialogueSend = true; break; case 14607: wildtele = 0; sendFrame171(1, 2465); sendFrame171(0, 2468); sendFrame126("Select an option", 2460); sendFrame126("Yes, i will help.", 2461); sendFrame126("No way, I'm to scared!", 2462); sendFrame164(2459); NpcDialogueSend = true; addItem(2436, 1); addItem(2440, 1); addItem(2442, 1); addItem(385, 1); addItem(385, 1); addItem(385, 1); addItem(385, 1); addItem(385, 1); addItem(385, 1); addItem(385, 1); addItem(385, 1); addItem(385, 1); addItem(385, 1); addItem(385, 1); addItem(385, 1); addItem(385, 1); addItem(385, 1); addItem(385, 1); addItem(385, 1); addItem(385, 1); addItem(385, 1); addItem(385, 1); addItem(385, 1); addItem(385, 1); addItem(385, 1); addItem(385, 1); addItem(385, 1); addItem(954, 1); break; }

1st thing:
How do i make the npc in the chat move?like the real rs?

2nd thing:
How do i make it when you choose and option it gives u stuff and says something else?

3rd thing:
How do i make my entrance unable to access unless you talk to the npc?

Heres my entrance code:

case 10: //GodWars Entrance if(server.gameTime > 0) { sendMessage("Game is already in play!"); } else { if(server.godwarsmax >= 10) { sendMessage("Game is Full!"); } else { isgodwars = true; showInterface(18452); godTimer= 5; server.godwarsmax += 1; showitem(8025, "Welcome to the Godwars lair!", "Good Luck!"); } } break;

will repp hard if u help me!

Read full topic
